In 0.8.3 one or two countermeasures made your plane unhittable, and now 5 chaff and 4 flare droppers are not enough? ThatÃ‚Â´s very sad IMO. How many should you spam?

I use 8, and the problem is that the stormwind doesn't turn enough. The radar missile works by:

Firing

Getting a lock

Finding the plane's velocity vector

Aiming at the vector

(chaff will remove the lock, with enough it will confuse the missile(that is like 10 pods))

If the plane doesn't turn then the missile explodes where it predicted the plane to be and thus where it is

If it doesn't turn enough, the blast gets the plane

with a significant direction change, the vector isn't picked up again if chaff is deployed

the missile then misses.

I had 2 chaff and 2 flare and it worked perfectly.

Also, I am constantly checking the page just to see is the match done yet

Sidewinders work by doing this:

firing

getting heat lock and predicting plane's location

Flares attract missile

missile goes to flare

without flare, missile hits

But how can I make the plane turn more (I have steer factor 20 and it can do 15g+ with manual steering)? Also in the battle vs. the Heatwave it turned a lot and the missile still continued chasing it.
